Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Temozolomide is approved to treat the following types of brain cancer in adults:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Anaplastic astrocytoma. It is used:As adjuvant treatment in patients whose cancer is newly diagnosed.In patients whose cancer did not respond to therapy.
Glioblastoma multiforme (GBM). It is used with radiation therapy in patients with newly-diagnosed cancer and then alone as maintenance therapy.

Section.Para: Temozolomide is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
